name: Summer Toppers Corn Butters
description: Make, take, and wow 'em! Perfect for camping, bbqs, and block parties!
preparation:
1. Stir butter with Topper of your choice and lemon juice.
  2. On waxed paper or plastic wrap, form butter into a log about 8 inches long. Roll up and seal.
  3. Refrigerate until firm, 20 minutes, then slice into coins.
